actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Colorado River in the State of Utah for study as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates a segment of the Colorado River in the State of Utah for study as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Colorado River in the State of Utah for study as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
